name: Borb Arena
description:
Roll around an arena as a borb (bird-orb) and knock your opponents away!

This game is best experienced with a gamepad (Supports Xbox 360, Xbox One, and PS4 gamepads) and played with friends! (Supports up to 4 players locally on the same computer.)

Controls:

  • Hold a direction using the left stick (gamepad) or WASD (keyboard) to aim.
  • While holding a direction, hold down X (PS4), A (Xbox), or space (keyboard) to charge your throw. Then release the button to throw your borb in that direction.

Music is by Fancy Lizard Studio via the Unity Asset Store.  Link
